mapper.select: SELECT /* SellerSearchMapper.listWithdrawalReason, 탈퇴 사유 목록 조회, 김다슬/인크로스, 2014-03-19 */ CD_ID AS secedeReasonCode , CD_NM AS secedeReasonMessage FROM TB_CM_CD WHERE GRP_CD_ID = 'US0104' AND LANG_CD = #{langCd}

SELECT /* SellerSearchMapper.listBanksByCountry, 나라별 해외은행 정보 조회, 김다슬/인크로스, 2014-03-19 */ NATION_CD AS nationCode, NATION_NM AS nationName, ALPHA2_CD AS alphaCode, BANK_NO AS bankNo, NATION_TEL_NO AS nationTelNo, NATION_DESC AS nationDesc, IBAN_USE_YN AS ibanUseYn, ABA_USE_YN AS abaUseYn, SORT_USE_YN AS sortUseYn, BSB_USE_YN AS bsbUseYn, SWIFT_USE_YN AS swiftUseYn FROM TB_CM_NATION WHERE USE_YN = 'Y'
